channel.title: South China Sea Mesoscale Eddies Today
channel.description: Detected South China Sea Mesoscale Eddies Updated Everyday

item.title: Bathymetry (color) superposed with NRT L4 SSHA (black contours) and Detected Eddy Edges - 20200304
item.description: Positive SSHA indicated by black solid line while negative SSHA denoted by black dashed line. The interval of SSHA is 2 cm. Closed magenta contours stand for the edges of detected anticyclonic eddies while closed green ones mark the eddges of cyclonic eddies
